summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Greenwood/Phinney Ridge Neighborhood Plan; amending the Seattle Comprehensive Plan to incorporate portions of the Greenwood/Phinney Ridge Neighborhood Plan, and amending the Official Land Use Map, Title 23 of the Seattle Municipal Code, to reflect the boundaries of the Greenwood/Phinney Ridge Residential Urban Village.
committee: Neighborhoods, Growth Planning and Civic Engagement
